item.title: Digital Marketing Specialist - Upwork
item.description:
Remote work possible

We are a growing video production company seeking a dynamic and innovative Digital Marketing Specialist to enhance our digital presence and drive our marketing strategies.

Job Description:
We are looking for a Digital Marketing Specialist with a strong interest in artificial intelligence to manage our outward-facing look and ensure our brand remains at the forefront of industry trends. This role will involve managing our social media platforms, creating and scheduling posts, engaging with our audience, and producing high-quality visual content.

Key Responsibilities:
Manage and grow our presence on social media platforms (LinkedIn, YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, etc.).
Create, schedule, and publish engaging content that aligns with our brand voice and strategy.
Edit videos and create graphics using Photoshop and other design tools.
Track and analyze social media metrics and website traffic to inform strategies.
Optimize content for SEO to improve visibility.
Engage with our online community, respond to comments, and foster a positive brand image.
Stay updated on the latest AI trends and implement relevant strategies to help scale the company.

Requirements:
Proven experience in digital marketing and social media management.
Proficiency in video editing and graphic design software (e.g., Adobe Premiere, Photoshop).
Strong understanding of SEO and web traffic metrics.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Ability to analyze data and derive actionable insights.
Strong interest in artificial intelligence and its applications in marketing.
Creative mindset with the ability to develop engaging content.

How to Apply:
Please send your resume, portfolio, and a cover letter explaining why you are the perfect fit for this role.

The job is $100/month.  Please respond "I UNDERSTAND" at the top of your response for this job. This will let me know you read this description completely.

Budget: $500
Posted On: June 23, 2024 13:43 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:LinkedIn, Facebook, YouTube, Social Media Marketing, Internet Marketing, Marketing Strategy, Instagram, LinkedIn Marketing
Skills: LinkedIn, Facebook, YouTube, Social Media Marketing, Internet Marketing, Marketing Strategy, Instagram, LinkedIn Marketing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Dragon Ball YouTube Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
I am seeking a highly skilled and experienced video editor with expert knowledge of the Dragon Ball metaseries (original, Z, GT, Super) for a multi-part what-if video series. This includes adding special effects, transitions, and audio enhancements to ensure a seamless and engaging viewing experience. The editor should be able to create stunning masterpieces that are guaranteed to capture the audience's attention.

► What-if scenario: What if Goku was sent to our Earth/What if Dragon Ball took place in our universe?
This scenario will attempt a realistic approach in line with real-life physics and locations.

► Key skills required:
    - Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro (or any other professional video editing software);
    - Strong understanding of the Dragon Ball metaseries and its characters;
    - Photoshop and AI image generation proficiency (since the videos will cover a what-if scenario that has not even been attempted thus far in the Dragon Ball community and we'll need imagery consistent with the script);
    - Mastery of visual effects and motion graphics techniques;
    - Attention to detail and the ability to meet deadlines;
    - The ability to create suspense and cinematic-feeling videos to keep the audience engaged.

► Further information:
    - Channel link: https://www.youtube.com/@ministry-of-saiyans
    - You will be provided with the script and the voiceover.
    - Each part should be about 15 minutes in length.
    - The budget on display is for the first part of the series. Subsequent parts will be funded through the use of further milestones.

► If you are a passionate Dragon Ball fan with an outstanding track record in video editing, we would love to hear from you. Apply now!

► Please note: Only applicants with top-level experience (and the portfolio to back it up) and knowledge will be considered. We only want the cream of the crop. In addition, the inability to meet our expectations post-signing will result in the unilateral termination of the contract.

Budget: $70
Posted On: June 23, 2024 13:36 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Motion Graphics, Video Production
Skills: Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Motion Graphics, Video Production
Country: Romania
click to apply

item.title: Project-Based Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Are you a talented video editor with a knack for creating engaging and polished content? We’re seeking a skilled individual to join our team on a project basis, helping us transform raw footage into compelling, digestible videos to be posted on social media.

About Us:
At Nine Two Media we specialize in increasing our clients ideal customer base through strategic and impactful lead generation efforts. Our mission is to help our clients grow their business.

Role Overview:
As a project-based video editor, you will be responsible for crafting videos that showcase our brand and services. You’ll work closely with our team to transform recordings from client meetings and raw footage into educational or promotional content. We’re looking for someone who can not only edit videos but also write captivating captions and manage the posting process on our social media channels.

Responsibilities:
1. Edit recordings from client meetings and raw footage into polished, engaging videos.
2. Create both educational and promotional content tailored to our target audience.
3. Write compelling captions to accompany the videos on social media platforms.
4. Collaborate with our team to ensure the videos align with our brand identity and messaging.
5. Manage the posting schedule and ensure timely delivery of completed videos.

Requirements:
1. Proven experience in video editing, with a portfolio showcasing your skills.
2. Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar.
3. Strong written communication skills for crafting engaging captions.
4. Ability to work independently and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
5. Familiarity with social media platforms and their video requirements.

How to Apply:

Please visit our website at https://accountingleadsnow.com/ and YouTube (https://www.youtube.com/@AccountingLeadsNow/shorts) to familiarize yourself with our style of videos.

Then, send us samples of your work that demonstrate your ability to create similar content.

Compensation will be based on experience, and this position is project-based, meaning you’ll work with us on specific content creation tasks as needed.

Join us in shaping the future of Nine Two Media through captivating video content! Apply now to be considered for this exciting opportunity.

Attention to detail is an absolute must! At the top of your application please reference #92 or you will not be considered.


Posted On: June 23, 2024 13:34 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Instagram Reels, Instagram Story, Promotional Video, Final Cut Pro, Video Editing, Testimonial Video, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Instagram Reels, Instagram Story, Promotional Video, Final Cut Pro, Video Editing, Testimonial Video, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Video Edit for Tourism B2B company - Upwork
item.description:
I need an editor/producer to compile a sales pitch video, to help more tour operators decide to join my B2B travel community - Cycle Cities. - cyclecities.tours

All the footage is shot and will be provided. It's a scripted video of me talking, with cutaways to provided photos and videos as per the script instructions.

Here is the script:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1b780dJS0RP7QzImmnKR3jEzFuOaxGcX-3OqLb9Y5-0Y/edit?usp=sharing

I have split the script in 8 sections. Here is the first video from section 1 (introduction):
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1RTyB8rAyXNs8oxq1bh73n7n9RTHlWfIJ/view?usp=sharing

The footage is not word-perfect to the script.  Each video is labelled against its section in the script.

There are a total of 22 videos covering the 8 sections, as outtakes have been retained in case needed. Outtakes will be labelled. Each video is average 40-60 seconds. No video is more than 2 mins. The end result will be less than 10 mins when fully compiled.

Photos for cutaways will be provided e.g.
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1q_Bxu8jj72za140jjTSITlFfrDJ98Heg/view?usp=sharing

Video in 1080. I think this is a fairly simple job, but needs someone with intermediate experience who can complile the footage and get the transitions and cutaways looking professional and timed well.

I'll also provide any other resources requested e.g.

Logos
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1w_G4lpuaa-UeDV2u7HJpUjcwD1rEtb2K?usp=sharing

Testimonial videos - there should be at least 1 testimonal clip at the end.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dv4T-XptAWY&list=PLIS6ko42pzKUD0h4jQiApyQQI7mh3KB1b

The final video will replace the one currently at cyclecities.mn.co

If you're interested in this job, please tell me how you understand the script and purpose of the video, and what you could do to make it great! If you have suggestions on how the video/script could be improved, I would also be happy to hear those.

Any questions, please ask.
Looking forward to working with you.

Thanks,
Steve




Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 23, 2024 13:20 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Promotional Video, Spokesperson Video, Testimonial Video, Video Editing, Video Production
Skills: Promotional Video, Spokesperson Video, Testimonial Video, Video Editing, Video Production
Country: Australia
click to apply
